Package monkey.mnk

Class ThreatsCounter

  • java.lang.Object
    • monkey.mnk.ThreatsCounter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable
    public class ThreatsCounter
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Cloneable
    A ThreatsCounter keeps track of the number of Threats of a certain type.
    Since:
    1.0

      • decrement

        public void decrement​(Player player)
        Decrements a given Player's counter. Does not increment anything if such Player is null.
        Parameters:
        player - Specifies whose counter is to be decremented.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalCallerException - The counter is already at 0.
        java.lang.NullPointerException - The player is null.
        Since:
        1.0

      • get

        public int get​(Player player)
        Returns the current value of a given Player's counter.
        Parameters:
        player - Specifies whose counter is to be decremented. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        The current value of the desired counter.
        Throws:
